message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I understand you want a bit more, but this split feels fairer to me. Let's make a deal!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share
Time is running out!  This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I'll take a bit less than before, but it's still more than you offered
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time. 50/50. We're both losing money with every passing round.
